## Container.mergeStore() method

Merge values onto the container store.

Signature:

```typescript
mergeStore(values: Repository): this;
```

Decorators:

`@bind`

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                    | Description                              |
| --------- | --------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------- |
| values    | [Repository](/api/container/repository) | Values to merge onto the container store |

Returns:

this

The container instance

## Example

```js
container.mergeStore({ test: "foo" });
```
